title: Textile, 1850–1900
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 71 x 62 cm (27 15/16 x 24 7/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 71.5 x 62 cm (28 1/8 x 24 7/16 in.)
Repeat H: 39 cm (15 3/8 in.)
Both selvedge to selvedge.
description: Three scenes of children playing.  Faded from red tones to yellow tones.
